explains: n. 圆片，晶片；薄片，干胶片；薄饼；圣饼

sentences.en: Many fans want to sup with Mr Jones, despite the fact that he once exploded after eating a wafer-thin mint.
sentences.cn: 许多粉丝都想和琼斯先生共进晚餐，尽管有一次他曾在吃下薄如薄纸的薄荷叶后大发雷霆。

sentences.en: This wastes about half of the wafer material.
sentences.cn: 这浪费了大概一半的晶圆材料。

sentences.en: Different catalysts coat each side of the wafer.
sentences.cn: 晶片的两面均包裹着催化剂。
